LanguageData.CookMeatSoup.label: cook meat soup
LanguageData.CookMeatSoup.description: Prepares a meat soup from raw meat and a few raw plants. Produces 2.
LanguageData.CookHeartyStew.label: cook hearty stew
LanguageData.CookHeartyStew.description: Prepares a hearty stew from raw meat, potatoes and carrots. Produces 2.
LanguageData.MakeMakiRolls.label: make maki rolls
LanguageData.MakeMakiRolls.description: Make maki rolls from rice, algae and fish meat. Produces 2.
LanguageData.MakeCheeseGrilled.label: Grill cheese sandwich
LanguageData.MakeCheeseGrilled.description: Grills a sandwich from bread and cheese. Produces 2.
LanguageData.MakeKebab.label: make kebab
LanguageData.MakeKebab.description: Make kebab from vegetables, mushrooms and meat. Produces 2.
LanguageData.MakeMushroomMadness.label: make mushroom madness
LanguageData.MakeMushroomMadness.description: Make a mysterious dish from different mushrooms. Produces 2.
LanguageData.MakeCoconutCurry.label: cook coconut curry
LanguageData.MakeCoconutCurry.description: Prepares an exotic dish from meat, rice and coconut milk. Produces 2.
LanguageData.MakeBurgerCheese.label: cook cheese burger
LanguageData.MakeBurgerCheese.description: Cooks a burger made from bread, meat and cheese. Delicious! Produces 2.
LanguageData.MakeMisoSoup.label: cook miso soup
LanguageData.MakeMisoSoup.description: Prepares a luxury miso soup from tofu, algae, mushrooms and onion. Produces 2.
